description: The expert team of scientists from the University of Cambridge, UK, has made a shocking statement by claiming that there are signs of life at a distant planet, K2- 18 b. The scientists have discovered DMS and DMDS molecules in the plant’s atmosphere. However, the claims are being questioned worldwide.
title: Scientists Reportedly Found a Potential Sign of Life on a Distant Planet: What You Need to Know

description: Donald Pettit worked for seven months in space and came back to Earth on his 70th birthday, April 20.
title: NASA’s Oldest Active Astronaut Lands with his Crewmates on 70th Birthday

description: Sony Xperia 1 VI was launched in May last year with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC and triple rear cameras. Now, Sony appears to be gearing up to release the Xperia 1 VII to succeed last year's Xperia 1 VI. Ahead of the formal announcement, the handset was allegedly spotted on Taiwan's National Communications Commission (NCC) website. The listing reveals the Sony Xperia 1 VII's design and colour options.
title: Sony Xperia 1 VII Design, Colourways Reportedly Spotted via Live Images on Taiwan's NCC Website

description: Bharti Airtel has upgraded its international roaming (IR) portfolio by bringing a fresh recharge plan. The new roaming plan costs Rs. 4,000 and it covers a range of 189 countries. The latest plan, which is designed to aid people who travel to multiple destinations frequently, can be used both in India and overseas. It offers benefits like unlimited data, 100 voice minutes and in-flight connectivity.
title: Airtel International Roaming Plan With Access to Data in India and 189 Countries Launched

description: Apple is seeking to import most of the iPhones it sells in the US from India by the end of next year. The plans are the latest sign of Apple and its suppliers accelerating a pivot away from China, a process that began when harsh Covid lockdowns hurt production at its largest plant.
title: Apple Aims to Build Most iPhones for US in India by End of 2026

description: The Financial Intelligence Unit of India (FIU-IND) has instructed all crypto exchanges to re-verify the KYC data of their users before June 30. The aim of this step is to maintain accurate details of crypto holders, while also identifying those flouting national crypto tax laws.
title: FIU-IND Reportedly Sets June 30 Deadline for Crypto Exchanges to Redo KYC Verification

description: The PlayStation adds a slate of titles every month to its Game Catalog and Classics Catalog, but a selection of games departs the service, too, from time to time. Sony has confirmed a bunch of games that will leave PS Plus soon. These include popular titles like Grand Theft Auto 5, Ghostrunner and Infamous Second Son
title: Grand Theft Auto 5, Batman: Arkham Knight and More Are Leaving PS Plus Game Catalog Soon

description: Motorola announced major upgrades for Moto AI, the company’s in-house artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot. Announced on Thursday, the Lenovo-owned brand is adding four new AI features to Moto AI — Next Move, Playlist Studio, Image Studio and Look and Talk. Additionally, the company is also partnering with major AI players such as Google, Meta, Microsoft, and Perplexity to integrate their offerings into Moto AI.
title: Motorola Adds New Features to Moto AI; Teams Up With Google, Microsoft and Perplexity

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is rumoured to be launched in May as the latest addition to the flagship Galaxy S25 lineup. Ahead of its anticipated introduction, the South Korean technology conglomerate is said to have accidentally leaked the Canadian pricing of the upcoming handset. As per a report, it appeared under the terms and conditions of discounts offered on the Galaxy Tab S10 FE series, which hints towards the Galaxy S25 Edge potentially being more expensive than the Galaxy S25+.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Alleged Price Leaks; Might Cost More Than the Samsung Galaxy S25+

description: US banking regulators have pulled back directives urging banks to show caution when dabbling in cryptocurrency. Under the prior guidance, regulators warned banks to be wary of volatility, legal uncertainty and liquidity risks when considering whether to provide crypto-related services or take on crypto companies as clients.
title: US Bank Regulators Pull Back Guardrails on Bank Crypto Activities

description: Vivo X200 FE could arrive in India in place of the X200 Pro Mini, which was unveiled in China in October 2024, alongside the base and Pro variants. The latter two were introduced in India in December last year. A recent report claims that the company may launch an FE variant in the country, in place of the Pro Mini version. It could still be accompanied by the Vivo X200 Ultra.
title: Vivo X200 FE to Launch in India Soon With Purported Dimensity 9400e Chip, 6.31-inch OLED Display: Report

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 will begin in India soon. The e-commerce site has confirmed the date when the sale will go live. Amazon Prime members are promised early access. A wide range of items will be available at considerably lowered prices during the sale. The online retailing platform has hinted at some of the discounts and bank offers that will likely be extended during the sale.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale Date Announced: Discounts on Samsung Phones, More Teased

description: iPhone 17 Pro has been spotted in a hands-on image that showcases the anticipated design of the handset. The picture reveals a new rectangular camera array, hinting at a potential change in design. The rear design of the iPhone 17 Pro bears a resemblance to Google's latest Pixel smartphones.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Hands-on Image Points to Redesigned Rectangular Rear Camera Module

description: Motorola’s Edge 60 Pro gets plenty of upgrades this year. There’s a new display, revamped cameras, a new processor and a massive battery. There’s also plenty of AI action going on inside compared to what’s available on outgoing models. We got a chance to try out the phone for a while, and here’s all you need to know about it and how it compares to the previous Edge 50 Pro model.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro First Impressions

description: Four stories, four families, and one powerful message, Niram Marum Ulagil is a must-watch Tamil drama that celebrates the often-unspoken strength of parents, where the beauty of relations is intact in endurance, love and sacrifices. The stories are interlinked, and they depict the world changing its colours as per the situations.
title: Niram Marum Ulagil Now Streaming on Sun NXT: Everything You Need to Know
Samsung Kicks Off Biggest Walk-a-thon India Challenge Yet: Galaxy Watch Ultra Up For Grabs!

description: A lavish wedding, a mysterious disappearance, and lots of twists, the perfect recipe for a sequel. The audience is awaiting the movie, which will be released on May 1st. This time, the film is coming with a double twist in the story, raising its own bar.
title: Another Simple Favor OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Blake Lively and Anna Kendrick Stylish Sequel

description: EMI is a Tamil family drama that takes the viewers on an emotional journey wherein the plot revolves around a young man who is stuck between unpaid debts, broken relationships and a lot more mental pressure. This story of life crises is highly relatable for the common man. EMI is a must-watch for a light-hearted watch. The movie will stream from May 01, 2025, on Tentkotta.
title: EMI OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Tamil Family Drama Online?

description: iQOO Z10 Turbo and Z10 Turbo Pro are scheduled to be launched in China on April 28. Ahead of their anticipated debut, the company has shared official marketing material via its social media platform, revealing several of the key specifications. The iQOO Z10 Turbo Pro is confirmed to be powered by a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset with 9600Mbps LPDDR5X Ultra RAM. Both phones will sport OLED screens with a 144Hz refresh rate.
title: iQOO Z10 Turbo, Z10 Turbo Pro Chipset and Other Specifications Revealed Ahead of China Launch

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE has been doing the rounds of the rumour mill over the past few weeks. The smartphone is expected to be a more affordable version of the purported Galaxy Z Flip 7. Previous leaks have hinted at the expected key features and probable price of the clamshell foldable. Recent reports claim that the foldable handset may arrive with a slightly different moniker than was being expected.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE Spotted Online With Galaxy Z Flip 7 Xe Moniker

description: With an atmospheric setting, powerful performances, and a fast-paced narrative, Veera Dheera Sooran Part 2 is raising the bar for Tamil thrillers on OTT platforms. Viewers can enjoy the movie from their homes and applaud the work of Chiyaan Vikram and other stars.
title: Veera Dheera Sooran Part 2, Chiyaan Vikram’s Intense Thriller, Now Streaming on Prime Video

description: Dreame Technology has appointed Bollywood actress Kriti Sanon as its first Indian brand ambassador. This collaboration will help the company expand its presence in India. Dreame offers a range of products in the country, including intelligent robotic vacuums for hands-free home maintenance, high-performance cordless stick vacuums for seamless cleaning, versatile wet and dry vacuums, and grooming products such as the Airstyle and high-speed hair dryers.
title: With Kriti Sanon Onboard as a Brand Ambassador, Dreame Products Set to Hit Retail Shelves Soon

description: YouTube announced on Wednesday that it is testing a version of Google Search’s AI Overviews on its platform. The video streaming giant is experimenting an implementation of the artificial intelligence (AI) feature to show users clips from videos in a carousel which could be most relevant or helpful to the searched query.
title: YouTube Testing AI Overviews in Search Results With Video Carousel Format

description: Alphabet reassured jittery tech investors that its AI investments were powering returns at its crucial ad business on Thursday. The search giant's first-quarter profit and revenue beat expectations, and the company said it would buy back $70 billion (roughly Rs. 5,97,800 crore) in stock, adding $75 billion (roughly Rs. 6,40,362 crore) to its market value.
title: Google Says Deep AI Investments Powering Ad Sales, Soothing Anxious Investors

description: Apple is expected to debut the latest firmware iterations for its devices, such as iOS 19 and iPadOS 19, at the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025 in June. While the rumour mill has hinted towards many of the anticipated changes, a recently surfaced report suggests that Apple could introduce several new productivity-linked features for the iPad and iPhone.
title: iPadOS 19 May Reportedly Bring macOS-Style Menu Bar, Stage Manager 2.0; iPhone to Get External Display Support

description: Motorola Edge 60 Pro could arrive in India soon. The handset has already been unveiled in select global markets alongside the standard Motorola Edge 60 model. A tipster has now claimed that the phone may be available in the country by the end of this month. The Indian variant will likely be similar to its global counterpart.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro India Launch Timeline Leaked After Global Debut

description: Nintendo's new Switch 2 console maintained strong momentum toward its summer release. Concerns about the price, $150 (roughly Rs. 12,816) higher than the predecessor Switch, and a gloomy macroeconomic outlook have not dampened consumer enthusiasm for the long-awaited gadget.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Keeps Up Fast Pace With US Pre-Order Sellout

description: Oppo K13 5G will go on sale in India for the first time today. The new Oppo K series smartphone was launched in the country last week with a Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 chipset and 8GB of RAM. The Oppo K13 5G carries a 7,000mAh battery with 80W charging support. The new phone will be available to purchase via the company's India Website and Flipkart in two colour options.
title: Oppo K13 5G Goes on Sale in India for the First Time Today: Price, Specifications, Sale Offers

description: Remedy Entertainment has announced the release date for its upcoming co-op shooter FBC Firebreak. The three-player FPS, which is set in the world of Remedy’s action-adventure title Control, will launch on PC, PS5 and Xbox Series S/X on June 17, the studio confirmed in a developer live-stream on Thursday.
title: Remedy's Co-Op Shooter FBC Firebreak Launches June 17; Pricing, Editions Detailed

description: The overall crypto market valuation rose by 0.92 percent over the last day. While Bitcoin saw profits on Friday, Apri 25, Ether was struck with losses amid volatile market. Ripple, Dogecoin, and Tron logged price dips. Whereas Cardano, Leo, and Solana registered small gains.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Price Hovers Around $93,000 as Altcoins Face Market Volatility

description: Motorola has released its Moto Buds Loop true wireless stereo (TWS) earphones and Moto Watch Fit in select global markets on Friday. The new audio device and wearable were announced alongside the Motorola Edge 60 series. The Moto Buds Loop earbuds are Motorola's first take on wireless open-ear earbuds and have a design that is inspired by jewellery. They feature 12mm drivers with Bose tuning. The Moto Watch Fit offers a 1.9-inch OLED display and a heart rate sensor.
title: Moto Buds Loop Open-Ear Bose-Tuned Earbuds Launched, Moto Watch Fit Tags Along

description: There is a big box of entertainment launching on OTT platforms like Netflix, ZEE5, JioHotstar, and Prime Video this Friday to keep the viewers entertained and kill the boredom. There is a lot of drama, thriller, action and comedy which can be enjoyed by various types of audience.
title: OTT Releases this Week: Jewel Thief, MAD Square, Havoc, Veera Dheera Sooran Part 2, and More

description: Reddit is rolling out its artificial intelligence (AI) conversational chatbot to more users. Dubbed Reddit Answers, the chatbot is now available in India, and users can access it via the website, mobile web, as well as Android and iOS apps. The discussion forum-style social media platform first began testing the feature in December 2024.
title: Reddit's AI-Powered Answers Chatbot Is Now Available to Users in India

description: Motorola Edge 60 series was launched in the global markets on Thursday, April 24. Two models — Motorola Edge 60 Pro and Edge 60 — have been introduced and both of them get 1.5K pOLED screens, 50-megapixel triple rear camera units, and IP68 +  IP69-rated builds. The Edge 60 Pro is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme processor, while the Edge 60 gets Dimensity 7300 SoC. Both phones have up to 12GB of RAM and up to 512GB of onboard storage options.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro, Edge 60 With 1.5K pOLED Screens and 50-Megapixel Triple Rear Cameras Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Realme 14T 5G has been launched in India. The smartphone packs a 6,000mAh battery with 45W wired fast charging support and carries a 50-megapixel rear camera. It is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset paired with 8GB of RAM. With 2,100 nits of peak brightness level support, it is claimed to have the segment's brightest AMOLED display.
title: Realme 14T 5G With 6,000mAh Battery, MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC Launched in India: Price, Specifications
8 Health Parameters You Can Monitor on Galaxy Watch Ultra & Why They Matter

description: iPhone 17 Air may arrive in markets alongside the base iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max later this year. Recently, a video showcased the slimness of the Air variant against other models. This time, similar comparisons have been made via leaked live images of iPhone 17 series dummy units. The expected RAM support of the upcoming smartphones has been tipped as well.
title: iPhone 17 Air With Ultra-Slim Design Spotted via Leaked Dummy Units; Tipped to Arrive With Support 12GB of RAM
More Than Just a Stylus: Discover What the S Pen Can Do on the Galaxy Tab S Series

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge was first teased during the Galaxy Unpacked event in January this year, and the Galaxy S25 series phone then made an appearance at MWC 2025. The flagship was expected to land in markets on April 15, but those leaks were recently dismissed. Now, a new report from Korea suggests that the Galaxy Unpacked event for the Galaxy S25 Edge will take place in the third week of May. The phone will reportedly first be available in South Korea and China. However, Samsung has yet to confirm the device's launch date officially.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Launch Date Reportedly Set; Pricing Leaked Ahead of Next Galaxy Unpacked Event

description: Motorola Razr 60 series was launched globally on Thursday as the latest clamshell-style foldable phones from the Lenovo-owned brand. In line with the preceding series, the new lineup comprises two models — the Motorola Razr 60 and the Razr 60 Ultra. Both phones come with pOLED LTPO internal screens and dual rear camera setup.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC Launched Alongside Razr 60: Price, Specifications
